name: Over and Over (SIsilicon)
description:
This is currently a demo of the game. More levels will come later.

A simple platformer game with "only one level".

Sounds familiar, doesn't it?

You'll be playing same level over and over and over and... you get the point. But don't worry. It's not going to be too boring. Each time there is a different twist have fun surviving solving each one. =)

Controls:

Left and right arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to jump.

Up and down arrow keys to pull the switch.

K key to "redo the level".
